title: Shadows of Solar Eclipse
description: During the morning of March 20, 2015, a total solar eclipse was visible from parts of Europe, and a partial solar eclipse from northern Africa and northern Asia. NASA's Terra satellite passed over the Arctic Ocean on March 20 at 10:45 UTC and captured the eclipse's shadow over the clouds in the Arctic Ocean.
